rules_text: [i]Anticipate[/i] – {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]“Ninety-nine percent of the tar in this swamp is dangerously hot. Now come with me and I'll show you something cool.”[/i]
